Feyerabend:

"To those who look at the rich material provided by history, and who are not intent on impoverishing it to please their lower instincts, their craving for intellectual security in the form of clarity, precision, 'objectivity,' 'truth,' it will become clear that there is only one principle that can be defended under all circumstances and in all stages of human development. It is the principle: Anything goes."
